dialog.text: Snow makes up about 60-70% of the image, with mountains in the background and trees centered left and right. The sky is clear. The terrain is pretty even aside from the mountains in the background.
How scattered are the trees? What's the outline shape of the mountain?

The trees pretty sparse on the left; there's only about five horizontally spanning. The mountains are quite uniform and are shallow, but there is about three very small peaks in the mountain. There are trees at the bottom of the mountain.
What about the lighting? How heavy is the snow? Any water?
The snow is very heavy; the lighting is very harsh on the snow. Due to the angle, the sunlight is on the opposite side of the mountain, so there is mostly shadow. No water is present in the image.
The trees are in the middle of the image. The bottom of the image begins with snow.
are there snows on the trees?
There is no snow on the trees. About 40% of the image bottom up is simply snow, and then the beginning of the mountains on the right side starts with trees at the bottom of it.
